docs.lead_paragraph: An Illinois law creating safe havens for mothers to abandon their newborns has been credited with saving lives.

headline.main: 10 Years of Hope, Trying to Save Abandoned Newborns
headline.print_headline: 10 Years of Hope, Trying to Save Abandoned Newborns

docs.snippet: An Illinois law creating safe havens for mothers to abandon their newborns has been credited with saving lives.

docs.lead_paragraph: Once promoted by the N.F.L. as a done deal, a program for H.G.H. testing has become engulfed in a dispute among the league, the players union and the World Anti-Doping Agency.

headline.seo: H.G.H. Testing Is Now Unlikely in N.F.L. This Season
headline.main: N.F.L. Says Players Union Delaying H.G.H. Testing This Season
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Says Players Union Delaying H.G.H. Testing This Season

docs.abstract: NFL players' union refuses to sign off on agreement with league to test players for human growth hormone, because World Anti-Doping Agency will not give union scientific information with which to make independent evaluation of test validity.
docs.snippet: Once promoted by the N.F.L. as a done deal, a program for H.G.H. testing has become engulfed in a dispute among the league, the players union and the World Anti-Doping Agency.
